channel.title: Zezima IRL
channel.description: [IMG]http://img340.imageshack.us/img340/493/42582287lu7.png[/img] He was filming himself hunting for Pokemon(http://youtube.com/watch?v=Ev6UaJwfWyM) on his Nintendo DS, and I found this reflection.

item.title: Zezima IRL
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:67, topic:180120”][quote author=goatee link=topic=241374.msg2169040#msg2169040 date=1207614001]

Has anyone noticed the youtube name is zezima0123 or something, not Zezima? Geez.

It is zezima… he said so ingame.
[/quote]He also said his mother was killed by his father in-game. His father was then released from prison because nothing was pinned towards his father(no evidence I suppose?). He then continued to live with his father until he ran away and went to college?

He’s quite the character.[/quote]

Lol. I laughed.

item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“bootnecklad, post:60, topic:180120”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=241374.msg2072624#msg2072624 date=1203807662]

The No-life fanboys who search and search for zezima are just like insurgants in iraq… they would do anything for there god.

You talk a lot of crap, you know that?

Hahahaha. No really I luaghed A LOT, two well known people from Moparscape (TheBeanie?) one says something then the person who talks crap says “You talk a lot of crap, you know that?”
That made my day. I see no problem with TheBeanie, its Taharok who talks crap.

Seconded Thararok I dont know what it is you have got against me but there are people on this forum that talk more crap then you and i Yet you dont go bitching about them
[/quote]

I don’t have a problem with you its Taharokwho talk crap.[/quote]

I know im talking to taharok

[quote=“Taharok, post:61, topic:180120”][quote author=TheBeanie link=topic=241374.msg2072624#msg2072624 date=1203807662]

The No-life fanboys who search and search for zezima are just like insurgants in iraq… they would do anything for there god.

Seconded Thararok I dont know what it is you have got against me but there are people on this forum that talk more crap then you and i Yet you dont go bitching about them
[/quote]

No, when you go insulting people’s cultures, that just bothers me. Perhaps you need to l2payrespect.[/quote]

Lol… playing games and idolising some nerd who plays a game isnt really a culture… Watch some discovery channel please.

item.title: Zezima IRL
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

[quote=“NickMoran06, post:46, topic:180120”][quote author=Taharok link=topic=241374.msg2064175#msg2064175 date=1203401494]

Of course he wears glasses

Who the hell cares? I am a person. You are a person. Zezima is a person. WHO CARES! We are people, we shouldn’t waste our time idolizing other people just because they can that which we cannot. We should, instead, spend our time working toward a single goal by which we do not think ourselves likely to achieve.
[/quote]
Dude, use your eyes. I am not idolising him. I am saying that he obviously wears glasses because he’s a nerd >.<[/quote]

How many ‘nerds’ do you know? I hope quite a lot to compare him to them. In actuality, you are putting him down for wearing glasses. ‘Nerd’ can be a derogatory term for anyone who is smarter than you or spends more time on the computer. Say, for instance, you play to many sports. Do you want me to be stereotypical and call you a jock because you wear tennis shoes? This is the same instance! You are being stereotypical that all ‘nerds’ (connotation-based) wear glasses. Honestly, open your eyes and grow up. I really do not understand how people can just sit their and insult other people. To be fully honest, it is fucking disgusting is what it is.

Niall:

[quote author=error.login link=topic=241374.msg2049743#msg2049743 date=1202869975][note to self] pokemon is now cool[/note to self]

Pokemon has always been cool. I remember when I lost my first charizard card. The kid that took it from he fucking gave it to his brother that had like 16 normal charizards and a few [s]normal/s shiny ones. I also lost my original pokemon blue, red + yellow(never had more than 1 pokemon game at any time), but I bought blue off of ebay for old times sake.

[quote author=exe626 link=topic=241374.msg2064287#msg2064287 date=1203404541]

[quote author=Mopman link=topic=241374.msg2064206#msg2064206 date=1203402358]
And there was me thinking people wore glasses for eye problems…
[/quote]I thought this as well when I read his post, a lot of the people I know(and a lot of people in this modern day) wear glasses[/quote]

As do I, well, I don’t need to wear them all the time(I’m only shortsighted) but the only good use is for watching tv.[/quote]

vba <3 <3 <3

And if you want some flashbacks to the old pokemon series episodes, I got all of them from 1 through 50 on my computer. Bloody 8 gb lol.

Read full topic
